abstract: Sprint will give customers buying its $70 a month voice, text and data plan unlimited calls to any mobile phone.
snippet: Sprint will give customers buying its $70 a month voice, text and data plan unlimited calls to any mobile phone.
lead_paragraph: The discounting continues in wireless service plans. Wednesday, AT&T matched T-Mobile and Verizon, giving some customers free calling to five preset numbers.

headline.main: Sprint Puts a Twist, and a Higher Price, on More Free Minutes
